attributes.action: Oppose the compulsory 2yr CBT test for 125cc motorcycles
attributes.additional_details:
Every 2yrs a rider of any 125cc motorcycle has to by law take a compulsory bike test
Yet with a full driving licence this law does not apply to 50cc mopeds
Which can be riden without L plates
This must stop
The costs are over £130 every two years to show you can ride safely
If you are still riding after two years then surely this is proof enough
sign the petition to get it to parliment to rid us of this cash cow
attributes.background: Stop compulsory 2yr CBT for 125cc motorcycle riders

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you'd like changes to the law on motorcycle tests, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
